channel.title: Lunch on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Lunch on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: a2b3 lunch non-summary for 3d week of January 2016
item.description: Thanks to everyone for coming to lunch. We had 16 people, and complete introductions in 23 minutes. The topic of the question was “repair”. Linda Diane Feldt is repairing her side door, original equipment on a 90 y/o house. Kathryn Sanderson darns socks. Dan Friedus wants to know if you want to repair his 1980s Bolens garden tractors. (Make an offer.) Ruthann Nichols teaches Science and Wine as a freshman seminar at the U.
